text: Maureen O'Hara (17 August 1920 - 24 October 2015) was an Irish-American actress and singer. She was born in Ranelagh, Dublin and was a naturalised American citizen. She starred in many movies. She is noted for usually playing fiercely passionate heroines in her movies. O'Hara died in her sleep at her home in Boise, Idaho at the age of 95. She was buried next to her husband at Arlington National Cemetery. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Actors from Dublin Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:Irish movie actors Category:Irish stage actors Category:Irish television actors Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Singers from Dublin Category:1920 births Category:2015 deaths
title: Maureen O'Hara
